original_text: This is the rule which the Lord gave to his people: ‘The first male baby born to a woman belongs to me. So you must bring him to me.
korean_text: 이는 주의 율법에 쓴 바 첫 태에 처음 난 남자마다 주의 거룩한 자라 하리라 한 대로 아기를 주께 드리고

sentences.original_text: which the Lord gave to his people
The first male baby born to a woman
So you must bring him to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희는 그를 내게 데려와야 합니다
